EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Dallas Grand Opening_Q317.Confirmation Roundtable Only
EmailTemplate.subject: Youâ€™re confirmed for the Dallas Executive Roundtable on Thursday, September 28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Executive Roundtable Rob Mee, CEO of Pivotal. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, September 28, 2017
Time: 4:00PM to 5:30PM CST Location: Pivotal Dallas Address: 3001 Hackberry Road, Irving, TX 75063 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3001+Hackberry+Rd,+Irving,+TX+75063/@32.9267769,-96.9880699,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c299f70a09d63:0xcd7539901d756fdf!8m2!3d32.9267769!4d-96.9858812]]>)
Questions? Please contact Peter Schmitt via email at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-dallas-grand-opening-q317]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/washington-dc-grand-opening/executive-roundtable?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-dc-grand-opening-q217]]>
